features: 【2 in 1 Computer Tablet with Keyboard】This item is a perfect combination, 10 inch Tablet connect with Bluetooth Keyboard you can use it as computer. Also with a mouse, protective case, flexible stylus, screen protector. Very easy to set up and connect. convenience for your work. You can change the tablet mode and computer mode easily.

【10.1'' HD Full View Display tablets】RUIQIAI Tab features a large 10.1-inch display that brings you into movies, shows, games and social media; an immersive on-screen experience - whether your family is watching a live stream or video chatting with a friend, the 10.1-inch screen delivers the best of what's going on at every moment.

【The Latest Android tablet】with an advanced Android 11 system, RUIQIAI Tab delivers lightning-fast performance and ample storage space for all your favorite apps, files, and media.Store your content with 64 GB of built-in memory; add a MicroSD card to expand storage to up to 1TB

【Long Battery Life】: Providing a 6000mWh rechargeable battery, the power-efficient tablet is designed to last for up to 6-8 hours on a single charge, so you can work or play throughout the day while you're on the move. Easily charge via the Type-C port and rest assured the battery will last.

【1-Year Warranty】: Since the date you buy the Wifi tablet, we will give a complete 365-day warranty period. RUIQIAI has always been committed to providing customers with a satisfactory shopping experience. If there is a problem, we will reply to you within 12 hours to help you solve the problem.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Always by your side In order to make it easy for you to carry around, the exclusive lightweight design is only 0.3 inches, no matter at home, work, travel ect. Play whenever you want 6000mAh battery combined with Quad-Core processor, lower power consumption, audio and video entertainment, games and learning, office meetings, fearless use of any scene, so you can use the tablet with confidence. More APP you like From your favorite apps and the latest games to streaming shows and movies, Android 11 offers more selection than ever before.

Featuring 1280 x 800 HD IPS display with dual speakers, 2MP front and 8MP rear, the display presents a bright display that will give you the HD experience whether you are watching videos, reading e-books, or playing games, a very pleasant visual and auditory experience for the user. (There is a new protective film placed in the Tablet pack)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My wife got this for her business and it’s great. It moves fast, the keyboard and mouse works great on the screen. Best 2 in 1 tablet/laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact it comes with everything in the picture. The color is perfect, the tablet is lightweight and the case is amazing for protection. The picture is clear and the sound . The speakers is very loud !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the cost
reviews.reviewText: I've had no real issues with it, for the price it's a great option for kids or if you need an affordable tablet. I have not used the mouse or keyboard, although I would like to try it out. The touch screen works well so I've never felt the need, but if I'm able to update this review I will once I do.It also has a tendency to go off the wifi for a minute and reconnect, but I don't know if that's the tablet or my wifi router because my TV tends to do it too and it's a top of the line TV set. The only real complaint I have is the camera can be blurry at times, and sometimes video is blurry at the start of a video but quickly improves to normal in a minute or so. All apps run fine on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Even expecting little with such a price, this tablet is TERRIBLE.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a little tablet to use as an e-reader and possibly to read some PDFs on. I quickly realized this thing couldn't even handle Gmail, so my idea of using it to read PDFs went within the first three to five days of having this thing. I've been actually using it for around a month, maybe six weeks (trying to use it) and at this point, I've completely wiped and reloaded everything once, I have only added the Kindle app, I keep it on Do Not Disturb and, unless I'm downloading a book, Airplane mode because it just can't handle anything at all. The battery drains even if I'm not touching it, screen not on, nothing, even with everything shut off as I mentioned. You cannot go activate the battery saver. The only way the battery saver will work is if you go set a schedule for it, you can't just click the battery saver and turn it on. Now, approximately six weeks (if that) into using it, it will say it's charging but the percentage never goes up, at all. I am hoping that once it dies (it probably has already but I got frustrated with it and haven't checked) that issue, at least, might clear up but I don't have much faith. Yes, it's a low price, no, it is NOT even worth that low price.Also, the stand thing does NOT work. It's too flimsy. I could probably tell you other things that are wrong with it but I can't use it long enough without a problem to get to any other problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Slow game processing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this tablet as a temporary substitute for my old king pad pro which I used for games and art. It runs the art apps I need smoothly so there isn't much issue there other than adds causing it to lag. As far as any games go, it lags pretty bad. The first few rhythm games I downloaded onto it ran alright for a couple days, but after about a week the lag made it nearly unplayable. Now it won't even keep the app open if I try to use the gatcha features, when other tablets are able to do it just fine. So, it's good for a cheep tablet, but definitely not my go to pick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Was a Christmas present for my 11 year old. Seems like a really good cheap tablet with lots of extras. She hasn't used the mouse and keyboard yet but it does what she wants. I guess if I had to complain about it it would be smaller storage and not the best camera. But for the price point it's good for sure and checks the boxes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet for entertainment and productivity
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a 10" Android tablet and have been very pleased with its performance. The tablet has a beautiful, high-resolution screen that is great for watching videos, playing games, and browsing the web.The tablet is also fast and responsive, thanks to its powerful processor and ample RAM. I've used it for multitasking, running productivity apps, and even light photo and video editing, and it has handled everything smoothly and efficiently.The tablet's battery life is also impressive, lasting several hours with heavy usage and even longer with lighter use. This makes it a great option for on-the-go entertainment and productivity.One thing I appreciate about this tablet is its expandable storage, which allows me to store all of my favorite apps, photos, and videos without worrying about running out of space.The tablet also comes with a range of useful features, such as a front-facing camera for video calls and a built-in GPS for navigation. It's also compatible with a wide range of accessories, such as keyboard cases and stylus pens, which makes it even more versatile.Overall, I highly recommend this 10" Android tablet to anyone looking for a high-quality, versatile device for entertainment and productivity. Its fast performance, beautiful screen, and expandable storage make it a great investment for anyone in the market for a new tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: This isn't some high quality tablet that you can use for a bunch of stuff. But it is great for small projects or if you want it just for some fun games. My husband uses it to create his games and I use mine to write. Would definitely recommend buying.
